french junior ministers resign over perks scandals -pipe- europe -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 05.07.2010 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 05.01.2011 home news germany europe map world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de corruption -pipe- 05.07.2010 french junior ministers resign over perks scandals großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : one politician lost his job over a penchant for cigars two french junior ministers have resigned over spending scandals , as the government attempts to regain political credibility following a series of setbacks . french president nicolas sarkozy has accepted the resignation of two of his junior ministers after separate spending scandals .
the resignations from alain joyandet , state secretary for overseas development , and christian blanc , state secretary for the greater paris region , followed disclosures that both politicians had abused their office perks .
joyandet came under fire following press reports that he hired a private jet costing 116,500 euros to fly on official business to the caribbean , when he could have taken a regular scheduled flight .
he was also criticized last month over claims he was granted a permit illegally to build an extension to his house in saint tropez .
blanc 's office spent 12,000 euros -lrb- $ 14,680 -rrb- on cigars , and the minister himself admitted to smoking a third of them .
he was ordered to pay back the full bill . the revelations came as the french government was looking to promote ministerial sobriety and budget austerity in the face of a deficit set to hit a record high of eight percent of gdp .
sarkozy asserts authority bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : both blanc -lrb- l . -rrb- and joyandet resigned on sunday the resignations came as a surprise , as two days previously sarkozy had publicly criticized the two men 's behavior and made clear they would be removed from their posts in the next cabinet reshuffle in october .
but the president appeared unwilling to sacrifice his labor minister , eric woerth , who has also faced corruption accusations .
woerth has been the subject of daily scrutiny over the so-called ' bettancourt affair . '
french authorities have ordered a full review into the tax situation of liliane bettancourt , the 87-year-old heiress of the l 'oreal cosmetics group , after one of her advisors acknowledged there may have been financial irregularities .
opposition politicians have questioned why woerth never ordered a review while he was budget minister from 2007 to 2010 , suggesting it may have been because his wife then worked for the company that managed bettancourt 's wealth .
woerth has denied any wrongdoing and sarkozy has openly defended him .
leftist leaders say the furor over blanc and joyandet is a " fire shield " to distract voters from woerth 's ongoing difficulties .
in order for the state to save money , neither minister will be replaced .
sarkozy has also ordered that official use of planes and cars be restricted and departmental parties banned .
author : catherine bolsover -lrb- reuters , afp -rrb- editor : nancy isenson send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic share this article what is social bookmarking ?
dw-world.de french workers stage mass strike in retirement age dispute french workers have staged a day of strikes with demonstrations taking place across the country .
unions want the government to rethink controversial reforms that would raise the retirement age from 60 to 62 .
-lrb- 24.06.2010 -rrb- sarkozy rival villepin launches new french political party former french prime minister dominique de villepin has officially launched a new center-right political party , aimed at unseating president nicolas sarkozy in 2012 .
-lrb- 20.06.2010 -rrb- sarkozy reshuffles cabinet after crushing election defeat french president nicolas sarkozy has made only minor cabinet changes after his center-right bloc suffered heavy defeats in regional elections .
the appointments may help him garner support within his party .
-lrb- 23.03.2010 -rrb- feedback do you think it was appropriate for the men to resign ?
send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

woerth has been the subject of daily scrutiny over the so-called ' bettancourt affair . '

leftist leaders say the furor over blanc and joyandet is a " fire shield " to distract voters from woerth 's ongoing difficulties .

sarkozy has also ordered that official use of planes and cars be restricted and departmental parties banned .

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de corruption -pipe- 05.07.2010 french junior ministers resign over perks scandals großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : one politician lost his job over a penchant for cigars two french junior ministers have resigned over spending scandals , as the government attempts to regain political credibility following a series of setbacks . french president nicolas sarkozy has accepted the resignation of two of his junior ministers after separate spending scandals .
the resignations from alain joyandet , state secretary for overseas development , and christian blanc , state secretary for the greater paris region , followed disclosures that both politicians had abused their office perks .
joyandet came under fire following press reports that he hired a private jet costing 116,500 euros to fly on official business to the caribbean , when he could have taken a regular scheduled flight .
he was also criticized last month over claims he was granted a permit illegally to build an extension to his house in saint tropez .
blanc 's office spent 12,000 euros -lrb- $ 14,680 -rrb- on cigars , and the minister himself admitted to smoking a third of them .
he was ordered to pay back the full bill . the revelations came as the french government was looking to promote ministerial sobriety and budget austerity in the face of a deficit set to hit a record high of eight percent of gdp .
sarkozy asserts authority bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : both blanc -lrb- l . -rrb- and joyandet resigned on sunday the resignations came as a surprise , as two days previously sarkozy had publicly criticized the two men 's behavior and made clear they would be removed from their posts in the next cabinet reshuffle in october .
but the president appeared unwilling to sacrifice his labor minister , eric woerth , who has also faced corruption accusations .
woerth has been the subject of daily scrutiny over the so-called ' bettancourt affair . '
french authorities have ordered a full review into the tax situation of liliane bettancourt , the 87-year-old heiress of the l 'oreal cosmetics group , after one of her advisors acknowledged there may have been financial irregularities .
opposition politicians have questioned why woerth never ordered a review while he was budget minister from 2007 to 2010 , suggesting it may have been because his wife then worked for the company that managed bettancourt 's wealth .
woerth has denied any wrongdoing and sarkozy has openly defended him .
leftist leaders say the furor over blanc and joyandet is a " fire shield " to distract voters from woerth 's ongoing difficulties .
in order for the state to save money , neither minister will be replaced .
sarkozy has also ordered that official use of planes and cars be restricted and departmental parties banned .
author : catherine bolsover -lrb- reuters , afp -rrb- editor : nancy isenson send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic share this article what is social bookmarking ?
dw-world.de french workers stage mass strike in retirement age dispute french workers have staged a day of strikes with demonstrations taking place across the country .
unions want the government to rethink controversial reforms that would raise the retirement age from 60 to 62 .
-lrb- 24.06.2010 -rrb- sarkozy rival villepin launches new french political party former french prime minister dominique de villepin has officially launched a new center-right political party , aimed at unseating president nicolas sarkozy in 2012 .
-lrb- 20.06.2010 -rrb- sarkozy reshuffles cabinet after crushing election defeat french president nicolas sarkozy has made only minor cabinet changes after his center-right bloc suffered heavy defeats in regional elections .
the appointments may help him garner support within his party .
-lrb- 23.03.2010 -rrb- feedback do you think it was appropriate for the men to resign ?
send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de corruption -pipe- 05.07.2010 french junior ministers resign over perks scandals großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : one politician lost his job over a penchant for cigars two french junior ministers have resigned over spending scandals , as the government attempts to regain political credibility following a series of setbacks . french president nicolas sarkozy has accepted the resignation of two of his junior ministers after separate spending scandals .
the resignations from alain joyandet , state secretary for overseas development , and christian blanc , state secretary for the greater paris region , followed disclosures that both politicians had abused their office perks .
joyandet came under fire following press reports that he hired a private jet costing 116,500 euros to fly on official business to the caribbean , when he could have taken a regular scheduled flight .
he was also criticized last month over claims he was granted a permit illegally to build an extension to his house in saint tropez .
blanc 's office spent 12,000 euros -lrb- $ 14,680 -rrb- on cigars , and the minister himself admitted to smoking a third of them .
he was ordered to pay back the full bill . the revelations came as the french government was looking to promote ministerial sobriety and budget austerity in the face of a deficit set to hit a record high of eight percent of gdp .
sarkozy asserts authority bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : both blanc -lrb- l . -rrb- and joyandet resigned on sunday the resignations came as a surprise , as two days previously sarkozy had publicly criticized the two men 's behavior and made clear they would be removed from their posts in the next cabinet reshuffle in october .
but the president appeared unwilling to sacrifice his labor minister , eric woerth , who has also faced corruption accusations .
woerth has been the subject of daily scrutiny over the so-called ' bettancourt affair . '
french authorities have ordered a full review into the tax situation of liliane bettancourt , the 87-year-old heiress of the l 'oreal cosmetics group , after one of her advisors acknowledged there may have been financial irregularities .
opposition politicians have questioned why woerth never ordered a review while he was budget minister from 2007 to 2010 , suggesting it may have been because his wife then worked for the company that managed bettancourt 's wealth .
woerth has denied any wrongdoing and sarkozy has openly defended him .
leftist leaders say the furor over blanc and joyandet is a " fire shield " to distract voters from woerth 's ongoing difficulties .
in order for the state to save money , neither minister will be replaced .
sarkozy has also ordered that official use of planes and cars be restricted and departmental parties banned .

-lrb- 20.06.2010 -rrb- sarkozy reshuffles cabinet after crushing election defeat french president nicolas sarkozy has made only minor cabinet changes after his center-right bloc suffered heavy defeats in regional elections .
the appointments may help him garner support within his party .

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de corruption -pipe- 05.07.2010 french junior ministers resign over perks scandals großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : one politician lost his job over a penchant for cigars two french junior ministers have resigned over spending scandals , as the government attempts to regain political credibility following a series of setbacks . french president nicolas sarkozy has accepted the resignation of two of his junior ministers after separate spending scandals .
the resignations from alain joyandet , state secretary for overseas development , and christian blanc , state secretary for the greater paris region , followed disclosures that both politicians had abused their office perks .
joyandet came under fire following press reports that he hired a private jet costing 116,500 euros to fly on official business to the caribbean , when he could have taken a regular scheduled flight .
he was also criticized last month over claims he was granted a permit illegally to build an extension to his house in saint tropez .
blanc 's office spent 12,000 euros -lrb- $ 14,680 -rrb- on cigars , and the minister himself admitted to smoking a third of them .
he was ordered to pay back the full bill . the revelations came as the french government was looking to promote ministerial sobriety and budget austerity in the face of a deficit set to hit a record high of eight percent of gdp .
sarkozy asserts authority bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : both blanc -lrb- l . -rrb- and joyandet resigned on sunday the resignations came as a surprise , as two days previously sarkozy had publicly criticized the two men 's behavior and made clear they would be removed from their posts in the next cabinet reshuffle in october .
but the president appeared unwilling to sacrifice his labor minister , eric woerth , who has also faced corruption accusations .
woerth has been the subject of daily scrutiny over the so-called ' bettancourt affair . '
french authorities have ordered a full review into the tax situation of liliane bettancourt , the 87-year-old heiress of the l 'oreal cosmetics group , after one of her advisors acknowledged there may have been financial irregularities .
opposition politicians have questioned why woerth never ordered a review while he was budget minister from 2007 to 2010 , suggesting it may have been because his wife then worked for the company that managed bettancourt 's wealth .
woerth has denied any wrongdoing and sarkozy has openly defended him .
leftist leaders say the furor over blanc and joyandet is a " fire shield " to distract voters from woerth 's ongoing difficulties .
in order for the state to save money , neither minister will be replaced .
sarkozy has also ordered that official use of planes and cars be restricted and departmental parties banned .

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de corruption -pipe- 05.07.2010 french junior ministers resign over perks scandals großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : one politician lost his job over a penchant for cigars two french junior ministers have resigned over spending scandals , as the government attempts to regain political credibility following a series of setbacks . french president nicolas sarkozy has accepted the resignation of two of his junior ministers after separate spending scandals .

but the president appeared unwilling to sacrifice his labor minister , eric woerth , who has also faced corruption accusations .
woerth has been the subject of daily scrutiny over the so-called ' bettancourt affair . '

sarkozy has also ordered that official use of planes and cars be restricted and departmental parties banned .

klose aims to break world cup goal scoring record -pipe- sports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 05.07.2010 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 16.09.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de world cup -pipe- 05.07.2010 klose aims to break world cup goal scoring record großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : klose is sitting on 14 world cup goals ahead of their semifinal match against spain , german striker miroslav klose insists ' die mannschaft ' have what it takes to beat the european champions . germany has the class to beat european champions spain in their world cup semifinal showdown on wednesday , said bayern munich and germany striker miroslav klose .
speaking a day after scoring a brace in germany 's 4-0 demolition of argentina in the quarters , klose said he had his eyes on becoming the all-time world cup top scorer .
" i want to score at least five goals at the world cup .
and i will be very satisfied if i score six , " klose told a news conference .
the 32-year-old scored five goals in world cups in 2002 and 2006 and has so far netted four times in the 2010 tournament .
that puts him one goal behind record scorer ronaldo of brazil , who netted 15 world cup goals between 1998 and 2006 .
measured , yet confident klose said that his team would n't get carried away after several resounding victories throughout the competition , including a 4-1 win over england and a 4-0 thumping of australia .
" spain is better than england and argentina , no question .
they are not unbeatable , and we will try to expose their weaknesses ...
we are better than 2008 and want to show that on the pitch , " said klose .
the germans will line up against spain without young forward thomas mueller , whose red-hot form has been one of the pillars of germany 's effectiveness .
the 20-year-old was given a yellow card in the win against argentina and will miss the semifinal clash .
bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : mueller has been a revelation this world cup germany coach joachim loew sought to downplay worries over having to rejig his lineup , insisting he had enough talent at his disposal to cover the loss of mueller .
" it 's clear it 's a blow for us - he has shown himself to be dangerous in front of goal .
but we have players who can replace him , " loew said .
possible replacements for mueller include hamburg attacking midfielder piotr trochowski and young bayern attacker toni kroos , both of whom have been given game time in south africa .
stuttgart-based striker cacau is also an option , but rumors still persist about an abdominal muscle strain that kept him out of the quarterfinals .
author : darren mara -lrb- dpa / afp -rrb- editor : nancy isenson send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic share this article what is social bookmarking ?
dw-world.de ' liberated ' veteran arne friedrich is germany 's secret star defender arne friedrich was the captain of the worst team in the bundesliga last season .
so why is he suddenly having such a terrific world cup ?
ironically , being out of the spotlight has helped him shine .
-lrb- 04.07.2010 -rrb- germany swamp argentina as maradona 's stars wilt in the spotlight the game was billed as a match-up of argentina 's offensive superstars versus germany 's scrappy collection of well-organized youngsters .
and so it was , but few had predicted what a mismatch that would be .
-lrb- 03.07.2010 -rrb- germany in semifinals after thrashing argentina 4-0 germany stormed into the world cup semifinals on saturday with a 4-0 drubbing of argentina in cape town .
miroslav klose scored twice , along with goals from thomas mueller and defender arne friedrich .
-lrb- 03.07.2010 -rrb- uruguay to face netherlands , after ghana 's double penalty nightmare uruguay are through to the world cup semifinals , after ghana lost out twice from the penalty spot .
the netherlands surprisingly beat brazil 2-1 in friday 's earlier match , and will face uruguay in the semis .
-lrb- 02.07.2010 -rrb- feedback will germany suffer without thomas mueller ?
send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de world cup -pipe- 05.07.2010 klose aims to break world cup goal scoring record großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : klose is sitting on 14 world cup goals ahead of their semifinal match against spain , german striker miroslav klose insists ' die mannschaft ' have what it takes to beat the european champions . germany has the class to beat european champions spain in their world cup semifinal showdown on wednesday , said bayern munich and germany striker miroslav klose .
speaking a day after scoring a brace in germany 's 4-0 demolition of argentina in the quarters , klose said he had his eyes on becoming the all-time world cup top scorer .
" i want to score at least five goals at the world cup .
and i will be very satisfied if i score six , " klose told a news conference .
the 32-year-old scored five goals in world cups in 2002 and 2006 and has so far netted four times in the 2010 tournament .
that puts him one goal behind record scorer ronaldo of brazil , who netted 15 world cup goals between 1998 and 2006 .
measured , yet confident klose said that his team would n't get carried away after several resounding victories throughout the competition , including a 4-1 win over england and a 4-0 thumping of australia .
" spain is better than england and argentina , no question .
they are not unbeatable , and we will try to expose their weaknesses ...
we are better than 2008 and want to show that on the pitch , " said klose .
the germans will line up against spain without young forward thomas mueller , whose red-hot form has been one of the pillars of germany 's effectiveness .
the 20-year-old was given a yellow card in the win against argentina and will miss the semifinal clash .
bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : mueller has been a revelation this world cup germany coach joachim loew sought to downplay worries over having to rejig his lineup , insisting he had enough talent at his disposal to cover the loss of mueller .
" it 's clear it 's a blow for us - he has shown himself to be dangerous in front of goal .
but we have players who can replace him , " loew said .
possible replacements for mueller include hamburg attacking midfielder piotr trochowski and young bayern attacker toni kroos , both of whom have been given game time in south africa .
stuttgart-based striker cacau is also an option , but rumors still persist about an abdominal muscle strain that kept him out of the quarterfinals .
author : darren mara -lrb- dpa / afp -rrb- editor : nancy isenson send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic share this article what is social bookmarking ?
dw-world.de ' liberated ' veteran arne friedrich is germany 's secret star defender arne friedrich was the captain of the worst team in the bundesliga last season .
so why is he suddenly having such a terrific world cup ?
ironically , being out of the spotlight has helped him shine .
-lrb- 04.07.2010 -rrb- germany swamp argentina as maradona 's stars wilt in the spotlight the game was billed as a match-up of argentina 's offensive superstars versus germany 's scrappy collection of well-organized youngsters .
and so it was , but few had predicted what a mismatch that would be .
-lrb- 03.07.2010 -rrb- germany in semifinals after thrashing argentina 4-0 germany stormed into the world cup semifinals on saturday with a 4-0 drubbing of argentina in cape town .
miroslav klose scored twice , along with goals from thomas mueller and defender arne friedrich .
-lrb- 03.07.2010 -rrb- uruguay to face netherlands , after ghana 's double penalty nightmare uruguay are through to the world cup semifinals , after ghana lost out twice from the penalty spot .
the netherlands surprisingly beat brazil 2-1 in friday 's earlier match , and will face uruguay in the semis .
-lrb- 02.07.2010 -rrb- feedback will germany suffer without thomas mueller ?
send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

bundesliga picks dramatic finish three weeks to go and there 's still much to play for - and predict - in the bundesliga .

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de world cup -pipe- 05.07.2010 klose aims to break world cup goal scoring record großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : klose is sitting on 14 world cup goals ahead of their semifinal match against spain , german striker miroslav klose insists ' die mannschaft ' have what it takes to beat the european champions . germany has the class to beat european champions spain in their world cup semifinal showdown on wednesday , said bayern munich and germany striker miroslav klose .
speaking a day after scoring a brace in germany 's 4-0 demolition of argentina in the quarters , klose said he had his eyes on becoming the all-time world cup top scorer .
" i want to score at least five goals at the world cup .
and i will be very satisfied if i score six , " klose told a news conference .
the 32-year-old scored five goals in world cups in 2002 and 2006 and has so far netted four times in the 2010 tournament .
that puts him one goal behind record scorer ronaldo of brazil , who netted 15 world cup goals between 1998 and 2006 .
measured , yet confident klose said that his team would n't get carried away after several resounding victories throughout the competition , including a 4-1 win over england and a 4-0 thumping of australia .
" spain is better than england and argentina , no question .
they are not unbeatable , and we will try to expose their weaknesses ...
we are better than 2008 and want to show that on the pitch , " said klose .
the germans will line up against spain without young forward thomas mueller , whose red-hot form has been one of the pillars of germany 's effectiveness .
the 20-year-old was given a yellow card in the win against argentina and will miss the semifinal clash .
bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : mueller has been a revelation this world cup germany coach joachim loew sought to downplay worries over having to rejig his lineup , insisting he had enough talent at his disposal to cover the loss of mueller .
" it 's clear it 's a blow for us - he has shown himself to be dangerous in front of goal .
but we have players who can replace him , " loew said .
possible replacements for mueller include hamburg attacking midfielder piotr trochowski and young bayern attacker toni kroos , both of whom have been given game time in south africa .
stuttgart-based striker cacau is also an option , but rumors still persist about an abdominal muscle strain that kept him out of the quarterfinals .

dw-world.de ' liberated ' veteran arne friedrich is germany 's secret star defender arne friedrich was the captain of the worst team in the bundesliga last season .
so why is he suddenly having such a terrific world cup ?
ironically , being out of the spotlight has helped him shine .
-lrb- 04.07.2010 -rrb- germany swamp argentina as maradona 's stars wilt in the spotlight the game was billed as a match-up of argentina 's offensive superstars versus germany 's scrappy collection of well-organized youngsters .
and so it was , but few had predicted what a mismatch that would be .
-lrb- 03.07.2010 -rrb- germany in semifinals after thrashing argentina 4-0 germany stormed into the world cup semifinals on saturday with a 4-0 drubbing of argentina in cape town .
miroslav klose scored twice , along with goals from thomas mueller and defender arne friedrich .
-lrb- 03.07.2010 -rrb- uruguay to face netherlands , after ghana 's double penalty nightmare uruguay are through to the world cup semifinals , after ghana lost out twice from the penalty spot .
the netherlands surprisingly beat brazil 2-1 in friday 's earlier match , and will face uruguay in the semis .

speaking a day after scoring a brace in germany 's 4-0 demolition of argentina in the quarters , klose said he had his eyes on becoming the all-time world cup top scorer .

and i will be very satisfied if i score six , " klose told a news conference .

they are not unbeatable , and we will try to expose their weaknesses ...
we are better than 2008 and want to show that on the pitch , " said klose .

the 20-year-old was given a yellow card in the win against argentina and will miss the semifinal clash .
bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : mueller has been a revelation this world cup germany coach joachim loew sought to downplay worries over having to rejig his lineup , insisting he had enough talent at his disposal to cover the loss of mueller .
" it 's clear it 's a blow for us - he has shown himself to be dangerous in front of goal .
but we have players who can replace him , " loew said .
possible replacements for mueller include hamburg attacking midfielder piotr trochowski and young bayern attacker toni kroos , both of whom have been given game time in south africa .
stuttgart-based striker cacau is also an option , but rumors still persist about an abdominal muscle strain that kept him out of the quarterfinals .

and so it was , but few had predicted what a mismatch that would be .

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de world cup -pipe- 05.07.2010 klose aims to break world cup goal scoring record großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : klose is sitting on 14 world cup goals ahead of their semifinal match against spain , german striker miroslav klose insists ' die mannschaft ' have what it takes to beat the european champions . germany has the class to beat european champions spain in their world cup semifinal showdown on wednesday , said bayern munich and germany striker miroslav klose .
speaking a day after scoring a brace in germany 's 4-0 demolition of argentina in the quarters , klose said he had his eyes on becoming the all-time world cup top scorer .
" i want to score at least five goals at the world cup .
and i will be very satisfied if i score six , " klose told a news conference .
the 32-year-old scored five goals in world cups in 2002 and 2006 and has so far netted four times in the 2010 tournament .
that puts him one goal behind record scorer ronaldo of brazil , who netted 15 world cup goals between 1998 and 2006 .
measured , yet confident klose said that his team would n't get carried away after several resounding victories throughout the competition , including a 4-1 win over england and a 4-0 thumping of australia .
" spain is better than england and argentina , no question .
they are not unbeatable , and we will try to expose their weaknesses ...
we are better than 2008 and want to show that on the pitch , " said klose .
the germans will line up against spain without young forward thomas mueller , whose red-hot form has been one of the pillars of germany 's effectiveness .
the 20-year-old was given a yellow card in the win against argentina and will miss the semifinal clash .
bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : mueller has been a revelation this world cup germany coach joachim loew sought to downplay worries over having to rejig his lineup , insisting he had enough talent at his disposal to cover the loss of mueller .
" it 's clear it 's a blow for us - he has shown himself to be dangerous in front of goal .
but we have players who can replace him , " loew said .
possible replacements for mueller include hamburg attacking midfielder piotr trochowski and young bayern attacker toni kroos , both of whom have been given game time in south africa .
stuttgart-based striker cacau is also an option , but rumors still persist about an abdominal muscle strain that kept him out of the quarterfinals .
author : darren mara -lrb- dpa / afp -rrb- editor : nancy isenson send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic share this article what is social bookmarking ?
dw-world.de ' liberated ' veteran arne friedrich is germany 's secret star defender arne friedrich was the captain of the worst team in the bundesliga last season .
so why is he suddenly having such a terrific world cup ?
ironically , being out of the spotlight has helped him shine .
-lrb- 04.07.2010 -rrb- germany swamp argentina as maradona 's stars wilt in the spotlight the game was billed as a match-up of argentina 's offensive superstars versus germany 's scrappy collection of well-organized youngsters .
and so it was , but few had predicted what a mismatch that would be .
-lrb- 03.07.2010 -rrb- germany in semifinals after thrashing argentina 4-0 germany stormed into the world cup semifinals on saturday with a 4-0 drubbing of argentina in cape town .
miroslav klose scored twice , along with goals from thomas mueller and defender arne friedrich .
-lrb- 03.07.2010 -rrb- uruguay to face netherlands , after ghana 's double penalty nightmare uruguay are through to the world cup semifinals , after ghana lost out twice from the penalty spot .
the netherlands surprisingly beat brazil 2-1 in friday 's earlier match , and will face uruguay in the semis .

send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de world cup -pipe- 05.07.2010 klose aims to break world cup goal scoring record großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : klose is sitting on 14 world cup goals ahead of their semifinal match against spain , german striker miroslav klose insists ' die mannschaft ' have what it takes to beat the european champions . germany has the class to beat european champions spain in their world cup semifinal showdown on wednesday , said bayern munich and germany striker miroslav klose .
speaking a day after scoring a brace in germany 's 4-0 demolition of argentina in the quarters , klose said he had his eyes on becoming the all-time world cup top scorer .
" i want to score at least five goals at the world cup .
and i will be very satisfied if i score six , " klose told a news conference .
the 32-year-old scored five goals in world cups in 2002 and 2006 and has so far netted four times in the 2010 tournament .
that puts him one goal behind record scorer ronaldo of brazil , who netted 15 world cup goals between 1998 and 2006 .

" spain is better than england and argentina , no question .
they are not unbeatable , and we will try to expose their weaknesses ...
we are better than 2008 and want to show that on the pitch , " said klose .
the germans will line up against spain without young forward thomas mueller , whose red-hot form has been one of the pillars of germany 's effectiveness .
the 20-year-old was given a yellow card in the win against argentina and will miss the semifinal clash .
bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : mueller has been a revelation this world cup germany coach joachim loew sought to downplay worries over having to rejig his lineup , insisting he had enough talent at his disposal to cover the loss of mueller .
" it 's clear it 's a blow for us - he has shown himself to be dangerous in front of goal .
but we have players who can replace him , " loew said .
possible replacements for mueller include hamburg attacking midfielder piotr trochowski and young bayern attacker toni kroos , both of whom have been given game time in south africa .
stuttgart-based striker cacau is also an option , but rumors still persist about an abdominal muscle strain that kept him out of the quarterfinals .

dw-world.de ' liberated ' veteran arne friedrich is germany 's secret star defender arne friedrich was the captain of the worst team in the bundesliga last season .
so why is he suddenly having such a terrific world cup ?
ironically , being out of the spotlight has helped him shine .
-lrb- 04.07.2010 -rrb- germany swamp argentina as maradona 's stars wilt in the spotlight the game was billed as a match-up of argentina 's offensive superstars versus germany 's scrappy collection of well-organized youngsters .
and so it was , but few had predicted what a mismatch that would be .
-lrb- 03.07.2010 -rrb- germany in semifinals after thrashing argentina 4-0 germany stormed into the world cup semifinals on saturday with a 4-0 drubbing of argentina in cape town .
miroslav klose scored twice , along with goals from thomas mueller and defender arne friedrich .
-lrb- 03.07.2010 -rrb- uruguay to face netherlands , after ghana 's double penalty nightmare uruguay are through to the world cup semifinals , after ghana lost out twice from the penalty spot .
the netherlands surprisingly beat brazil 2-1 in friday 's earlier match , and will face uruguay in the semis .

klose aims to break world cup goal scoring record -pipe- sports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 05.07.2010 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 16.07.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio about dw-radio what 's on ?

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de world cup -pipe- 05.07.2010 klose aims to break world cup goal scoring record großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : klose is sitting on 14 world cup goals ahead of their semifinal match against spain , german striker miroslav klose insists ' die mannschaft ' have what it takes to beat the european champions . germany has the class to beat european champions spain in their world cup semifinal showdown on wednesday , said bayern munich and germany striker miroslav klose .
speaking a day after scoring a brace in germany 's 4-0 demolition of argentina in the quarters , klose said he had his eyes on becoming the all-time world cup top scorer .
" i want to score at least five goals at the world cup .
and i will be very satisfied if i score six , " klose told a news conference .
the 32-year-old scored five goals in world cups in 2002 and 2006 and has so far netted four times in the 2010 tournament .
that puts him one goal behind record scorer ronaldo of brazil , who netted 15 world cup goals between 1998 and 2006 .
measured , yet confident klose said that his team would n't get carried away after several resounding victories throughout the competition , including a 4-1 win over england and a 4-0 thumping of australia .
" spain is better than england and argentina , no question .
they are not unbeatable , and we will try to expose their weaknesses ...
we are better than 2008 and want to show that on the pitch , " said klose .
the germans will line up against spain without young forward thomas mueller , whose red-hot form has been one of the pillars of germany 's effectiveness .
the 20-year-old was given a yellow card in the win against argentina and will miss the semifinal clash .
bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : mueller has been a revelation this world cup germany coach joachim loew sought to downplay worries over having to rejig his lineup , insisting he had enough talent at his disposal to cover the loss of mueller .
" it 's clear it 's a blow for us - he has shown himself to be dangerous in front of goal .
but we have players who can replace him , " loew said .
possible replacements for mueller include hamburg attacking midfielder piotr trochowski and young bayern attacker toni kroos , both of whom have been given game time in south africa .
stuttgart-based striker cacau is also an option , but rumors still persist about an abdominal muscle strain that kept him out of the quarterfinals .
author : darren mara -lrb- dpa / afp -rrb- editor : nancy isenson send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic share this article what is social bookmarking ?
dw-world.de ' liberated ' veteran arne friedrich is germany 's secret star defender arne friedrich was the captain of the worst team in the bundesliga last season .
so why is he suddenly having such a terrific world cup ?
ironically , being out of the spotlight has helped him shine .
-lrb- 04.07.2010 -rrb- germany swamp argentina as maradona 's stars wilt in the spotlight the game was billed as a match-up of argentina 's offensive superstars versus germany 's scrappy collection of well-organized youngsters .
and so it was , but few had predicted what a mismatch that would be .
-lrb- 03.07.2010 -rrb- germany in semifinals after thrashing argentina 4-0 germany stormed into the world cup semifinals on saturday with a 4-0 drubbing of argentina in cape town .
miroslav klose scored twice , along with goals from thomas mueller and defender arne friedrich .
-lrb- 03.07.2010 -rrb- uruguay to face netherlands , after ghana 's double penalty nightmare uruguay are through to the world cup semifinals , after ghana lost out twice from the penalty spot .
the netherlands surprisingly beat brazil 2-1 in friday 's earlier match , and will face uruguay in the semis .
-lrb- 02.07.2010 -rrb- 9798 dw-tv europe live journal - nachrichten mit interview we 're sorry , due to legal issues this content can not be transmitted as live stream .
if you are inside the united states , it is still possible for you to enjoy dw-tv .
for more information , please click here .

opinion : cooling ties or not , turkey and the eu need each other -pipe- world -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 05.07.2010 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 15.07.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio about dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de eu expansion -pipe- 05.07.2010 opinion : cooling ties or not , turkey and the eu need each other großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : recently , much has been made of the notion that eu accession is losing importance for turkey .
but this does n't mean ankara is turning its back on europe , says bahaeddin guengoer of deutsche welle 's turkish service . turkey can explain itself however it likes .
but its latest diplomatic actions - its " no " to iran sanctions in the un security council ; its goal of carrying out a zero-problem policy with all its neighbors - are being met in the west with anxious questions .
is turkey turning away from the west ?
does it see its future in the islamic camp ?
the answer to such questions is a definite " no . "
turkey is not turning its back on the west !
yes , the goal of eu accession is losing priority in ankara 's current policy .
turkey is acting with a new level of self-confidence in the international diplomatic arena , and no one should resent the country for trying to build up its status as a regional power - or for trying to look beyond the narrow confines of europe .
turkey seeks new responsibility tacticians from washington , brazil and brussels to tehran , the middle east and moscow have been trying to instrumentalize nato-member turkey to serve their own diplomatic goals for nearly 60 years .
now , turkey wants to take on more responsibility : in conflict regions like the middle east and the caucasus , as an arbitrator in atomic negotiations with iran , and not least as a reliable energy route for the west .
questioning whether turkey belongs in the european or the oriental camp is easy to understand - but its not justifiable .
since its founding nearly nine decades ago , the modern turkish republic has decided in favor of europe , and therefore , in favor of the west .
despite this , ankara ca n't look forward to being greeted with open arms in its efforts to join the european union - nor does the islamic world celebrate turkey 's western orientation .
its dialog with hamas as an unspoken condition for a dialog with iran , and its over-eager actions toward reprimanding israel , have led to a great deal of resentment in europe and the us - and at the same time , done serious damage to its relations with the jewish state .
two sides of a coin purely in terms of numbers , turkey has what it takes to back up its ambitions of strength .
the country has seen nearly 12 percent economic growth in the first quarter of the year , along with being the 16th-strongest economy in the world , and the 7th in europe .
but that is just one side of the coin .
on the other side is the growing polarization between the religious and the secular in a turkey whose population has yet to taste many of the fruits of economic growth .
the continuous lack of democratic process , the weak grasp of the concept of press freedom in a gray zone , or the unwillingness of prime minsiter erdogan to deal with criticism of either himself or his policies , are all alarming threats to domestic stability .
turkey belongs in europe !
europe and turkey need one another like never before .
turkey needs europe in order to build itself up as a regional power and to give it more weight in its influence on its neighbors .
for its part , without turkey , europe reduces its chances of succeeding in its global goals and strategies .
europe 's unified rejection of turkey needs to give way .
instead of explaining why turkey should n't accede to the eu , the heads of the european states should be racking their brains about how to make accession happen - or at least how to begin the process , since full membership is unlikely in the near future .
meanwhile , turkey is right to intensively build up its status as a regional power , instead of trying at all cost to become a member of a weaker , crisis-plagued eu .
author : bahaeddin guengoer -lrb- jen -rrb- editor : rob mudge send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic share this article what is social bookmarking ?
dw-world.de human rights and democracy watchdog calls for internet freedom in turkey the osce is urging the turkish government to lift recent restrictions on websites like youtube and reform a strict law curbing internet access .
-lrb- 24.06.2010 -rrb- turkey and us face tough decisions on relations after israeli flotilla raid while its relations with israel continue to plummet to new depths in the wake of the gaza flotilla raid , turkey is considering how to handle the us as washington tries to balance its ties with jerusalem and ankara .
-lrb- 02.06.2010 -rrb- can turkey save europe ?
with the european economy floundering , turkey - which underwent its own crisis in 2001 - has become a model of stability , boasting robust growth and a secure banking system .
now germany is seeking closer economic ties .
-lrb- 28.05.2010 -rrb- 9798 radio news listen to world headlines from the top of the hour .

cairo crisis egypt 's military council has warned protesters it will move in to break up the demonstrations .
watch the video in depth focus on libya dw-world looks at the turmoil in libya : what it means for tripoli and the rest of the world .
international conference media representatives around the world gather in bonn to discuss human rights .
podcast series by teaching stand-up comedy , bryan encourages his students to discover their talents .

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de eu expansion -pipe- 05.07.2010 opinion : cooling ties or not , turkey and the eu need each other großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : recently , much has been made of the notion that eu accession is losing importance for turkey .
but this does n't mean ankara is turning its back on europe , says bahaeddin guengoer of deutsche welle 's turkish service . turkey can explain itself however it likes .
but its latest diplomatic actions - its " no " to iran sanctions in the un security council ; its goal of carrying out a zero-problem policy with all its neighbors - are being met in the west with anxious questions .
is turkey turning away from the west ?
does it see its future in the islamic camp ?
the answer to such questions is a definite " no . "
turkey is not turning its back on the west !
yes , the goal of eu accession is losing priority in ankara 's current policy .
turkey is acting with a new level of self-confidence in the international diplomatic arena , and no one should resent the country for trying to build up its status as a regional power - or for trying to look beyond the narrow confines of europe .
turkey seeks new responsibility tacticians from washington , brazil and brussels to tehran , the middle east and moscow have been trying to instrumentalize nato-member turkey to serve their own diplomatic goals for nearly 60 years .
now , turkey wants to take on more responsibility : in conflict regions like the middle east and the caucasus , as an arbitrator in atomic negotiations with iran , and not least as a reliable energy route for the west .
questioning whether turkey belongs in the european or the oriental camp is easy to understand - but its not justifiable .
since its founding nearly nine decades ago , the modern turkish republic has decided in favor of europe , and therefore , in favor of the west .
despite this , ankara ca n't look forward to being greeted with open arms in its efforts to join the european union - nor does the islamic world celebrate turkey 's western orientation .
its dialog with hamas as an unspoken condition for a dialog with iran , and its over-eager actions toward reprimanding israel , have led to a great deal of resentment in europe and the us - and at the same time , done serious damage to its relations with the jewish state .
two sides of a coin purely in terms of numbers , turkey has what it takes to back up its ambitions of strength .
the country has seen nearly 12 percent economic growth in the first quarter of the year , along with being the 16th-strongest economy in the world , and the 7th in europe .
but that is just one side of the coin .
on the other side is the growing polarization between the religious and the secular in a turkey whose population has yet to taste many of the fruits of economic growth .
the continuous lack of democratic process , the weak grasp of the concept of press freedom in a gray zone , or the unwillingness of prime minsiter erdogan to deal with criticism of either himself or his policies , are all alarming threats to domestic stability .
turkey belongs in europe !
europe and turkey need one another like never before .
turkey needs europe in order to build itself up as a regional power and to give it more weight in its influence on its neighbors .
for its part , without turkey , europe reduces its chances of succeeding in its global goals and strategies .
europe 's unified rejection of turkey needs to give way .
instead of explaining why turkey should n't accede to the eu , the heads of the european states should be racking their brains about how to make accession happen - or at least how to begin the process , since full membership is unlikely in the near future .
meanwhile , turkey is right to intensively build up its status as a regional power , instead of trying at all cost to become a member of a weaker , crisis-plagued eu .

dw-world.de human rights and democracy watchdog calls for internet freedom in turkey the osce is urging the turkish government to lift recent restrictions on websites like youtube and reform a strict law curbing internet access .
-lrb- 24.06.2010 -rrb- turkey and us face tough decisions on relations after israeli flotilla raid while its relations with israel continue to plummet to new depths in the wake of the gaza flotilla raid , turkey is considering how to handle the us as washington tries to balance its ties with jerusalem and ankara .
-lrb- 02.06.2010 -rrb- can turkey save europe ?
with the european economy floundering , turkey - which underwent its own crisis in 2001 - has become a model of stability , boasting robust growth and a secure banking system .
now germany is seeking closer economic ties .
-lrb- 28.05.2010 -rrb- feedback what can the west do to bring turkey into the european fold ?
send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

opinion : cooling ties or not , turkey and the eu need each other -pipe- world -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 05.07.2010 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 26.10.2010 home news germany europe world from tierra del fuego to tijuana asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de eu expansion -pipe- 05.07.2010 opinion : cooling ties or not , turkey and the eu need each other großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : recently , much has been made of the notion that eu accession is losing importance for turkey .
but this does n't mean ankara is turning its back on europe , says bahaeddin guengoer of deutsche welle 's turkish service . turkey can explain itself however it likes .
but its latest diplomatic actions - its " no " to iran sanctions in the un security council ; its goal of carrying out a zero-problem policy with all its neighbors - are being met in the west with anxious questions .
is turkey turning away from the west ?
does it see its future in the islamic camp ?
the answer to such questions is a definite " no . "
turkey is not turning its back on the west !
yes , the goal of eu accession is losing priority in ankara 's current policy .
turkey is acting with a new level of self-confidence in the international diplomatic arena , and no one should resent the country for trying to build up its status as a regional power - or for trying to look beyond the narrow confines of europe .
turkey seeks new responsibility tacticians from washington , brazil and brussels to tehran , the middle east and moscow have been trying to instrumentalize nato-member turkey to serve their own diplomatic goals for nearly 60 years .
now , turkey wants to take on more responsibility : in conflict regions like the middle east and the caucasus , as an arbitrator in atomic negotiations with iran , and not least as a reliable energy route for the west .
questioning whether turkey belongs in the european or the oriental camp is easy to understand - but its not justifiable .
since its founding nearly nine decades ago , the modern turkish republic has decided in favor of europe , and therefore , in favor of the west .
despite this , ankara ca n't look forward to being greeted with open arms in its efforts to join the european union - nor does the islamic world celebrate turkey 's western orientation .
its dialog with hamas as an unspoken condition for a dialog with iran , and its over-eager actions toward reprimanding israel , have led to a great deal of resentment in europe and the us - and at the same time , done serious damage to its relations with the jewish state .
two sides of a coin purely in terms of numbers , turkey has what it takes to back up its ambitions of strength .
the country has seen nearly 12 percent economic growth in the first quarter of the year , along with being the 16th-strongest economy in the world , and the 7th in europe .
but that is just one side of the coin .
on the other side is the growing polarization between the religious and the secular in a turkey whose population has yet to taste many of the fruits of economic growth .
the continuous lack of democratic process , the weak grasp of the concept of press freedom in a gray zone , or the unwillingness of prime minsiter erdogan to deal with criticism of either himself or his policies , are all alarming threats to domestic stability .
turkey belongs in europe !
europe and turkey need one another like never before .
turkey needs europe in order to build itself up as a regional power and to give it more weight in its influence on its neighbors .
for its part , without turkey , europe reduces its chances of succeeding in its global goals and strategies .
europe 's unified rejection of turkey needs to give way .
instead of explaining why turkey should n't accede to the eu , the heads of the european states should be racking their brains about how to make accession happen - or at least how to begin the process , since full membership is unlikely in the near future .
meanwhile , turkey is right to intensively build up its status as a regional power , instead of trying at all cost to become a member of a weaker , crisis-plagued eu .
author : bahaeddin guengoer -lrb- jen -rrb- editor : rob mudge send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic share this article what is social bookmarking ?

-lrb- 02.06.2010 -rrb- can turkey save europe ?
with the european economy floundering , turkey - which underwent its own crisis in 2001 - has become a model of stability , boasting robust growth and a secure banking system .
now germany is seeking closer economic ties .
-lrb- 28.05.2010 -rrb- feedback what can the west do to bring turkey into the european fold ?
send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

readers laud germany 's defeat of argentina in world cup -pipe- reader response -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 05.07.2010 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 20.06.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio about dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de reader response -pipe- 05.07.2010 readers laud germany 's defeat of argentina in world cup großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : germany celebrated their team 's success vigorously on saturday letters of praise are pouring in from around the world after the german team showed tremendous skill in their rout of argentina in the world cup quarterfinals . the following comments reflect the views of dw-world.de readers .
not all reader comments have been published .
dw-world.de reserves the right to edit for length and appropriateness of content .
you 're lucky to have merkel but this team is the best gift for the new germany .
you deserve to be the leaders of europe . - constantin , greece i was and still am quite confident that germany will rise up as the new 2010 world cup champions with their new football philosophy which will dominate the future of football tactics in the whole world . - anas , sudan i have loved german football since 1972 as a schoolboy but have not until now been so thrilled by their style and panache .
they can really win the world cup . - zaid , trinidad and tobago their game against an experienced england side last week was a harder game , however , both were equally satisfying , but mueller 's yellow card was wrongly given and is of great concern to me .
i guess we have to do it the hard way … good luck germany ! - simon , trinidad and tobago what a wonderful display of soccer by the young lads from germany .
the world cup is the only time i enjoy following the game , and i am always reminded of how far behind the usa lags in talent .
good luck versus spain . - richard , us apart from the upset win by serbia in the group stage matches germany have been unstoppable , and since my revised tip is now gone , my new tip is germany .
jogi loew did the correct thing by checking the ghana versus australia match after germany was beaten by serbia in the group stage .
you learn from your mistakes and germany certainly did .
i am certain that germany will dedicate the world cup , if won , to the memory of robert enke .
there might be a rainbow forming from the host nations flag of south africa on germany ? - stuart , australia congratulations to germany .
germany are the best team in the world .
i 'm fascinated by the soccer that germany plays .
i 'll root for germany to win the cup .
hugs from a brazilian fan . - marcelo , brazil with the kind of players germany have , nobody should have any doubt that germans will lift the fifa cup 2010 .
all the best goal machines . - sonam , india the young lions will win the world cup . - berhanu , ethiopia it has been 20 years since i first watched die nationalmannschaft raise their third copa mundi in italy .
now , living in australia , i have been amazed by the quality of football on display by our german boys .
for 20 years , i have been hoping for a fourth cup , and now , i think that we are finally about to do it !
i wonder also about 2014 , with this side so young , we might also win our fifth in brazil ! - daeld , australia great play again from the german team , but too bad that argentina did n't live up to their potential .
teamwork and discipline as well as youth - all in good balance - go a long way .
go germany , go ! - d.d. , india there was never any doubt in my mind that our team was going to win against argentina .
i live in a small town in the niagara falls area , and during and after the game my neighbors displayed the german colors , after the italian , portuguese , south american flags and , yes , the us flags disappeared .
the parties on this canada day and fourth of july weekend now have a german accent .
outstanding performance germany , but mueller did not deserve the yellow card !
good luck germany , we are rooting for you ! - gerhard , canada every brazilian was cheering for germany .
your victory was awesome .
diego maradona must be very angry at you ! - claudia , brazil i think germany have been the outstanding team of the tournament .
they are a fantastic , committed , talented young team , who have the world at their feet .
i am so proud of them and wish them well .
deutschland to win the weltmeistershaft ! - stephen , australia dear germany , thank you so much for teaching a lesson in sportsmanship , civility , and grace during your defeating of argentina in the world cup tournament today .
you were great and we love you ! - wahab , us humiliating , yes , however , i am sure we shall have the pleasure to meet again .
congratulations and best wishes when you meet holland for the cup . - leon , us i want to congratulate the german team , who obtained one magnificent siege over the argentinean squad .
i 'm argentinean but have plenty of german blood from my grandparents , which make me sympathetic to all things german - and football is no exception .
i love football and objectively speaking , the german team today was one brilliant production .
congratulations . - edgardo , argentina to the magnificent german team , congratulations !
i heard it said , spain plays elegantly , but the germans are going to win !
and , never mind the dutch .
shoot-on ! - christa , us we are not just winning this world cup , we are going to equal brazil in 2014 .
as for schweinsteiger , he or oezil , or perhaps even muller are in the race to be named man of the tournament . - atsu , ghana congratulations germany on your wonderful performance .
keep up the good work .
we would like to see you win the cup !
with best wishes from india . - jayanta , india i just want to thank you germans for taking argentina out of the world cup . - claudio , brazil a fitting article by you on a game that was completely controlled by germany .
maradona seemed to be at the end of his wits .
it looks like he had no strategy for this game . - bhalchandra , india compiled by stuart tiffen editor : nancy isenson send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic share this article what is social bookmarking ?
dw-world.de press review : harsh criticism for argentina , praise for germany argentina 's press shows no mercy in their assessment of saturday 's 4-0 blowout against germany .
international papers , meanwhile , shower germany with praise for what some describe as the team 's best game yet .
-lrb- 04.07.2010 -rrb- germany dealt post-match praise after dismantling argentina from ordinary fans right up to the country 's leader , germans everywhere have heaped praise on their national football team after it ran riot against diego maradona 's argentina in their world cup quarterfinal clash .
-lrb- 04.07.2010 -rrb- germany swamp argentina as maradona 's stars wilt in the spotlight the game was billed as a match-up of argentina 's offensive superstars versus germany 's scrappy collection of well-organized youngsters .
and so it was , but few had predicted what a mismatch that would be .
-lrb- 03.07.2010 -rrb- germany in semifinals after thrashing argentina 4-0 germany stormed into the world cup semifinals on saturday with a 4-0 drubbing of argentina in cape town .
miroslav klose scored twice , along with goals from thomas mueller and defender arne friedrich .
-lrb- 03.07.2010 -rrb- ' liberated ' veteran arne friedrich is germany 's secret star defender arne friedrich was the captain of the worst team in the bundesliga last season .
so why is he suddenly having such a terrific world cup ?
ironically , being out of the spotlight has helped him shine .
-lrb- 04.07.2010 -rrb- 9798 media center watch and listen explore new content daily in dw 's multimedia archive .

send a text or photos to dw .

readers laud germany 's defeat of argentina in world cup -pipe- reader response -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 05.07.2010 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 24.07.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio about dw-radio what 's on ?

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de reader response -pipe- 05.07.2010 readers laud germany 's defeat of argentina in world cup großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : germany celebrated their team 's success vigorously on saturday letters of praise are pouring in from around the world after the german team showed tremendous skill in their rout of argentina in the world cup quarterfinals . the following comments reflect the views of dw-world.de readers .
not all reader comments have been published .
dw-world.de reserves the right to edit for length and appropriateness of content .
you 're lucky to have merkel but this team is the best gift for the new germany .
you deserve to be the leaders of europe . - constantin , greece i was and still am quite confident that germany will rise up as the new 2010 world cup champions with their new football philosophy which will dominate the future of football tactics in the whole world . - anas , sudan i have loved german football since 1972 as a schoolboy but have not until now been so thrilled by their style and panache .
they can really win the world cup . - zaid , trinidad and tobago their game against an experienced england side last week was a harder game , however , both were equally satisfying , but mueller 's yellow card was wrongly given and is of great concern to me .
i guess we have to do it the hard way … good luck germany ! - simon , trinidad and tobago what a wonderful display of soccer by the young lads from germany .
the world cup is the only time i enjoy following the game , and i am always reminded of how far behind the usa lags in talent .
good luck versus spain . - richard , us apart from the upset win by serbia in the group stage matches germany have been unstoppable , and since my revised tip is now gone , my new tip is germany .
jogi loew did the correct thing by checking the ghana versus australia match after germany was beaten by serbia in the group stage .
you learn from your mistakes and germany certainly did .

there might be a rainbow forming from the host nations flag of south africa on germany ? - stuart , australia congratulations to germany .
germany are the best team in the world .
i 'm fascinated by the soccer that germany plays .
i 'll root for germany to win the cup .
hugs from a brazilian fan . - marcelo , brazil with the kind of players germany have , nobody should have any doubt that germans will lift the fifa cup 2010 .
all the best goal machines . - sonam , india the young lions will win the world cup . - berhanu , ethiopia it has been 20 years since i first watched die nationalmannschaft raise their third copa mundi in italy .
now , living in australia , i have been amazed by the quality of football on display by our german boys .
for 20 years , i have been hoping for a fourth cup , and now , i think that we are finally about to do it !
i wonder also about 2014 , with this side so young , we might also win our fifth in brazil ! - daeld , australia great play again from the german team , but too bad that argentina did n't live up to their potential .

dw-world.de press review : harsh criticism for argentina , praise for germany argentina 's press shows no mercy in their assessment of saturday 's 4-0 blowout against germany .
international papers , meanwhile , shower germany with praise for what some describe as the team 's best game yet .
-lrb- 04.07.2010 -rrb- germany dealt post-match praise after dismantling argentina from ordinary fans right up to the country 's leader , germans everywhere have heaped praise on their national football team after it ran riot against diego maradona 's argentina in their world cup quarterfinal clash .

and so it was , but few had predicted what a mismatch that would be .
